oya kiyana pudgalaya hithagan ainne eya tharam krushikarmaya danna wenakenek naha kiyala.aththatama .oya paramparika wi walin wadi aswanu dena wi warga walata yanda une paramparika wi walin ena aswanna adu nisa.anith athata ehema aswanna aduwen labena kota wadi milakata wikunanda owana .ethakota kawda ehema ganne .oya sarala tharkaya gana hithanne nathuwa hamathanama mewa wawala dan wikunaganda baha.mama dakka dan masa kipayakata kalin seruwawila pansala laga hamudawen paramparika wi wikunana thanaka dala.habayi mila 50% adukarala.dan pora aluth wadak patan aran neda.
